geo:Document.gml:description: IGS site log for Julia Creek AuScope

geo:body.geo:content:
XXXX Site Information Form (site log) International GNSS Service See Instructions at: ftp://igscb.jpl.nasa.gov/pub/station/general/sitelog_instr.txt
0. Form
Prepared by (full name) : Garry John Cislowski Date Prepared : 2013-03-11 Report Type : NEW
1. Site Identification of the GNSS Monument
Site Name : Julia Creek AuScope Four Character ID : JLCK Monument Inscription : IERS DOMES Number : (A9) CDP Number : (A4) Monument Description : PILLAR Height of the Monument : 1.5m Monument Foundation : REINFORCED CONCRETE BLOCK Foundation Depth : 3.0m Marker Description : STAINLESS STEEL SPOGOT Date Installed : 2011-11-14T00:00Z Geologic Characteristic : CLAY Bedrock Type : SEDIMENTARY Bedrock Condition : (FRESH/JOINTED/WEATHERED) Fracture Spacing : (1-10 cm/11-50 cm/51-200 cm/over 200 cm) Fault zones nearby : NO Distance/activity : (multiple lines) Additional Information : SCDB PM 753339
2. Site Location Information
City or Town : JULIA CREEK State or Province : QUEENSLAND Country : AUSTRALIA Tectonic Plate : AUSTRALIAN Approximate Position (ITRF) X coordinate (m) : -4687826.8909 Y coordinate (m) : 3697045.0982 Z coordinate (m) : -2237233.7842 Latitude (N is +) : -204008.71 Longitude (E is +) : +1414415.91 Elevation (m,ellips.) : 127 Additional Information : (multiple lines)
3. GNSS Receiver Information
3.1 Receiver Type : TRIMBLE NETR9 Satellite System : GPS+GLO+GAL+QZSS Serial Number : 5211K83160 Firmware Version : 4.70 Elevation Cutoff Setting : 0 Date Installed : 2013-02-27T00:00Z Date Removed : (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ) Temperature Stabiliz. : (none or tolerance in degrees C) Additional Information : (multiple lines)
4. GNSS Antenna Information
4.1 Antenna Type : TRM59800.00 Serial Number : 5115354138 Antenna Reference Point : BPA Marker->ARP Up Ecc. (m) : 0.000 Marker->ARP North Ecc(m) : 0.000 Marker->ARP East Ecc(m) : 0.000 Alignment from True N : 0 Antenna Radome Type : NONE Radome Serial Number : Antenna Cable Type : SML400 Antenna Cable Length : 30M Date Installed : 2013-02-19T00:00Z Date Removed : (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mmZ) Additional Information : 2.0M RG58 pigtail installed at antenna
5. Surveyed Local Ties

11. On-Site, Point of Contact Agency Information
Agency : Department of Natural Resources & Mines Preferred Abbreviation : QDNRM Mailing Address : GPO Box 2454 Brisbane QLD 4001 Primary Contact Contact Name : Garry Cislowski Telephone (primary) : +61 7 3896 3030 Telephone (secondary) : +61 423 029 131 Fax : +61 7 3896 3697 E-mail : Garry.Cislowski@dnrm.qld.gov.au Secondary Contact Contact Name : Telephone (primary) : Telephone (secondary) : Fax : E-mail : Additional Information : (multiple lines)
